channel.title: Math, writing a formula?
channel.description:
I honestly suck at math, but was working on a web project. just needed some help with the formula. tried to message taharok cause he helps with a lot of harder math but he never replied. anyways, any help is welcome!
[quote="Vain_"]I know you're extremely good at math, seeing from the help you've provided in the past.
Was wondering if you could help me with this formula.
I'm working on an online world map for runescape, to update players position and draw them on the map via ajax.
I have the following formula to get the runescape coordinate via the position of the image (credits to steven of dementhium)
[code]x_coord = ((2049 + (x_pixel_image / (2 * 1)))); y_coord = ((830 + 3329) - (y_pixel_image / (2 * 1)));[/code]
such as resulting in pixels 1917,2302 being coordinates 3200,3200 behind lumbridge castle.
however, i have no clue how to say: use the coordinates (3200, 3200) and draw them on the image @ 1917,2303 - though for offsets i need to use x+3/y-12
so i need to draw the image at 1920, 2290 from the coordinates 3200,3200.
i myself could do the offsets, just don't know how to get the formula to work correctly.
all help will be appreciated[/quote]

item.title: Math, writing a formula?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:2, topic:533650”]I believe your x_coord formula is wrong, it should be:

x_coord = ((((2049 + (x_pixel_image / (2 * 1))))) / (5 - 4)) * (300-299);[/quote]with the current calculations, it draws the appropriate coordinates. but I will try both formulas above to see if they are more precise, or just throw it off.

however, I still need the reverse formulas

Read full topic

item.title: Math, writing a formula?
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:2, topic:533650”]I believe your x_coord formula is wrong, it should be:

x_coord = ((((2049 + (x_pixel_image / (2 * 1))))) / (5 - 4)) * (300-299);[/quote]according to my calculations the x coordinate should be as follows:

x_coord = ((((((1 << 11) + 1) + (x_pixel_image / ((1 << 1) * (1 << 0)))))) / (5 - (1 << 2))) * (((1 << 9) - 212) - ((1 << 8) + 43));

Read full topic

item.title: Math, writing a formula?
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

I believe your x_coord formula is wrong, it should be:

x_coord = ((((2049 + (x_pixel_image / (2 * 1))))) / (5 - 4)) * (300-299);

Read full topic
